did.head: Overview of the Collection

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Connecticut. State Harbor Commissioners for New Haven Harbor

did.unittitle: State Harbor Commissioners for New Haven Harbor records
did.abstract: Minutes of the State Harbor Commissioners for New Haven Harbor.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The State Harbor Commissioners for New Haven Harbor was established in 1872. The Board had responsibility for "the general care and supervision of new Haven harbor and its tide waters, and all of the flats and lands flowed thereby, in order to prevent and remove unauthorized enroachments and causes of every kind which are liable to interfere with the full navigation of said harbor, or in any way injure its channels, or cause any reduction of its tide waters."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records consist solely of meeting minutes. They include the only records of decisions for structures and dredging between the years 1925 and 1957 and the hearing record for changes in 1959 to the U. S. harbor lines at Sandy Point, New Haven Harbor.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: These records were received from the Department of Environmental Protection Office of Long Island Sound Programs on June 18, 2003.
